name: Accursed Guardian Naga
description: The Accursed Guardian Naga is a large serpentine creature with a powerful presence, capable of shifting between its serpent and a humanoid form. Its scales shimmer with a mystical aura, and its eyes glint with keen wisdom.
memorable: The naga's ability to shapeshift and its command over powerful spells, combined with its lair's enchantments, make it a formidable guardian.
goals: Typically serves as a guardian of its lair or sacred space, warding off intruders and protecting ancient secrets.
relations: Often serves powerful entities or deities, may have allies among other magical or monstrous beings.
environment: Usually found in lairs rich with magical energies, often near bodies of water or in ancient ruins.
strengths: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells, and its high Wisdom and Charisma enhance its spellcasting abilities.
weaknesses: While highly resilient to magic and poison, it may struggle against non-magical attacks.
attacks: The naga possesses a venomous bite that can deal both piercing and poison damage, and its spit poison attack can incapacitate foes from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: The Forbiddance spell in its lair creates a powerful barrier against teleportation and planar travel, alongside significant radiant damage to intruders.
additional_information: Immune to poison and charmed conditions.
Possesses a unique shapeshifting ability that allows it to transform its appearance.
Can cast a variety of spells, including powerful area-of-effect spells like Flame Strike.
Has exceptional saving throws against spells enhancing its combat resilience.
Benefits from the protective properties of its lair, enhancing its defensive capabilities.
spellcasting: An 11th level spellcaster able to cast a variety of powerful cleric spells, with a spell save DC of 16.
